body_html: I've seen both of those libraries and I know they have been around for a few years. I've never personally used them, but I know they are supposed to be alternatives to numpy/scipy. If we feel they can meet our needs, then I advocate that we use them instead of rewriting everything ourselves.

body: I've seen both of those libraries and I know they have been around for a few years. I've never personally used them, but I know they are supposed to be alternatives to numpy/scipy. If we feel they can meet our needs, then I advocate that we use them instead of rewriting everything ourselves.
